title: Moving league folder
body: I want to update my PBE but the download location is downloading in Windows (C:) with almost no space left. I want to move it into Data (D:) and im not sure how to, do I copy and paste the whole thing and delete the other one? Please help

replies.body: I'd recommend uninstalling the current one and reinstalling to the D drive if you want. That way you'll be sure nothing gets lost or corrupted when trying to transfer it.
